title: I heard a Scholar saying our Prophet ï·º will marry Mariam and Asiah in Jannah, is this correct?
transcript: hina says i have heard a scholar saying our prophet will marry maryam the mother of isla and asiya pharaoh's wife in jannah is this correct there is nothing authentic about this at all there is nothing authentic about this at all so to claim that the prophet will be the trophy and the prize of such honorable women needs proof and without proof we cannot just simply say such things and allah knows best you
